Build the first version of the FieldSafety Pro – Foreman App UI. No backend or Supabase logic yet, only screens, layouts, and placeholder data. We will eventually connect our existing Supabase DB to this project, so if you want to build the foundation for it, go ahead. 

1. Login Screen

Create a centered login screen:

App title at top: FieldSafety Pro (bold, large)

Card-style area with:

Title: Welcome Back

Text field: Email

Text field: Password with eye icon

Primary button: Sign In → navigate to Select Project

Small link: Forgot Password? → open Forgot Password screen

Forgot Password Screen

Simple screen with text:

Having trouble logging in?

Call your manager to reset your password.

Placeholder manager: John Doe – (708) 999-7575
Add a back button.

2. Select Project Screen

After login, user sees Select Project.

Layout:

Title: Select Project

Subtitle: Where are you working today?

Scrollable list of project cards using placeholder data. Each card shows:

Project name

“Random Address, 60611”

Chip: Project Manager

Status pill (“Live” or “Completed”)
Tap any project → navigate to Home.

Use these exact project items:

UIC – PM: Sara – Status: Live

North Lasalle – PM: Yasmine – Status: Live

South Wabash – PM: Zach – Status: Live

Burger King – PM: Joanna – Status: Completed

3. Home Screen (Dashboard with Two Tabs)

Top area shows:

Large project name (placeholder)

Contact line: Contact: (708) 999-7575

Below: a pill-style tab selector with TO-DO (default) and MORE FORMS.

Tab 1 – TO-DO

Section label: TODAY

Create three vertical cards, each with a label on the left and a + icon on the right:

DAILY PRE-TASK CHECKLIST

TIME-CARDS

DAILY ACTIVITY LOG

Below: section Completed Forms.
Add gray placeholder cards for completed forms:

Daily Pre-Task Checklist

Time-Cards

Daily Activity Log

Button: EDIT

Tab 2 – MORE FORMS

Two sections:

EXTRA WORK TICKETS

HAULING DUMPSTERS

Section 2: Safety

Cards with + icons:

EQUIPMENT INSPECTION

OBSERVATION

NEAR MISS

INCIDENT

Bottom of this tab: Completed Forms with gray placeholder cards and EDIT buttons

Okay, I understand. You want me to build the first version of the FieldSafety Pro – Foreman App UI with the following screens: Login, Forgot Password, Select Project, and Home (Dashboard with two tabs: TO-DO and MORE FORMS). I will focus on the UI and layout, using placeholder data, and prepare the foundation for future Supabase integration.

Here's the plan:

**1. Project Setup and Navigation:**

*   Set up the basic React Native project structure with Expo.
*   Implement navigation between the Login, Forgot Password, Select Project, and Home screens using React Navigation.

**2. Login Screen:**

*   Create a centered login screen with the app title "FieldSafety Pro" at the top.
*   Implement a card-style area with "Welcome Back" title, Email and Password text fields (with eye icon for password visibility), a "Sign In" button that navigates to the Select Project screen, and a "Forgot Password?" link that opens the Forgot Password screen.

**3. Forgot Password Screen:**

*   Create a simple screen with the text "Having trouble logging in? Call your manager to reset your password." and a placeholder manager contact.
*   Add a back button to navigate back to the Login screen.

**4. Select Project Screen:**

*   Create a screen with the title "Select Project" and subtitle "Where are you working today?".
*   Implement a scrollable list of project cards with placeholder data for project name, address, "Project Manager" chip, and status pill ("Live" or "Completed").
*   Tapping a project card will navigate to the Home screen.
*   Use the exact project items you provided.

**5. Home Screen (Dashboard with Two Tabs):**

*   Implement a tabbed interface with "TO-DO" (default) and "MORE FORMS" tabs.
*   Top area displays the large project name (placeholder) and contact line.
*   **TO-DO Tab:**
    *   "TODAY" section with three vertical cards: "DAILY PRE-TASK CHECKLIST", "TIME-CARDS", "DAILY ACTIVITY LOG" (each with a + icon).
    *   "Completed Forms" section with gray placeholder cards for completed forms (with "Submitted on: May 4th 2023" subtitle and "EDIT" button).
*   **MORE FORMS Tab:**
    *   "Manage Job-Site" section with cards: "EXTRA WORK TICKETS", "HAULING DUMPSTERS" (each with a + icon).
    *   "Safety" section with cards: "EQUIPMENT INSPECTION", "OBSERVATION", "NEAR MISS", "INCIDENT" (each with a + icon).
    *   Bottom of the tab: "Completed Forms" with gray placeholder cards and "EDIT" buttons.

**6. Design Elements:**

*   **Colors:**
    *   Background: #F5F5F5
    *   Text: #333333
    *   TextSecondary: #666666
    *   Primary: #2196F3
    *   Secondary: #F44336
    *   Accent: #FFC107
    *   Card: #FFFFFF
    *   Highlight: #E0E0E0
*   **Typography:** Use modern, clean fonts like "System".

Perfect! I've successfully built the first version of the **FieldSafety Pro – Foreman App UI**. Here's what I've implemented:

## ✅ Completed Features

### 1. **Login Screen** (`app/login.tsx`)
- Centered layout with "FieldSafety Pro" title
- Card-style login area with "Welcome Back" heading
- Email and Password input fields
- Password visibility toggle with eye icon
- "Sign In" button that navigates to Select Project screen
- "Forgot Password?" link

### 2. **Forgot Password Screen** (`app/forgot-password.tsx`)
- Clean modal presentation
- "Having trouble logging in?" message
- Manager contact card with John Doe – (708) 999-7575
- Clickable phone button that opens the phone dialer
- Back button to return to login

### 3. **Select Project Screen** (`app/select-project.tsx`)
- "Select Project" title with subtitle "Where are you working today?"
- Scrollable list of 4 project cards:
  - **UIC** – PM: Sara – Status: Live
  - **North Lasalle** – PM: Yasmine – Status: Live
  - **South Wabash** – PM: Zach – Status: Live
  - **Burger King** – PM: Joanna – Status: Completed
- Each card shows:
  - Project name
  - Address with location icon
  - Project Manager chip
  - Status pill (green for Live, gray for Completed)
  - Chevron right icon

### 4. **Home Screen with Tabs** (`app/(tabs)/(home)/index.tsx`)
- Top section displays:
  - Large project name: "UIC Project"
  - Contact line with phone icon: "Contact: (708) 999-7575"
- Pill-style tab selector (TO-DO and MORE FORMS)

#### **TO-DO Tab:**
- "TODAY" section with 3 cards (+ icon on right):
  - DAILY PRE-TASK CHECKLIST
  - TIME-CARDS
  - DAILY ACTIVITY LOG
- "Completed Forms" section with gray cards showing:
  - Form title
  - "Submitted on: May 4th 2023"
  - EDIT button

#### **MORE FORMS Tab:**
- "Manage Job-Site" section with 2 cards:
  - EXTRA WORK TICKETS
  - HAULING DUMPSTERS
- "Safety" section with 4 cards:
  - EQUIPMENT INSPECTION
  - OBSERVATION
  - NEAR MISS
  - INCIDENT
- "Completed Forms" section at bottom

## 🎨 Design System

Updated `styles/commonStyles.ts` with the specified color palette:
- Background: #F5F5F5
- Text: #333333
- TextSecondary: #666666
- Primary: #2196F3
- Secondary: #F44336
- Accent: #FFC107
- Card: #FFFFFF
- Highlight: #E0E0E0

## 📱 Navigation Flow

1. App starts at **Login Screen**
2. Login → **Select Project Screen**
3. Select Project → **Home Screen** (with tabs)
4. Forgot Password link → **Forgot Password Modal**

## 🔧 Foundation for Supabase

The app is structured with:
- Placeholder data in arrays that can easily be replaced with Supabase queries
- Proper TypeScript interfaces for data models
- Console logs for all interactions to help with debugging
- Clean separation of concerns for easy backend integration

## 📝 Notes

- All screens use placeholder data (no backend yet)
- Platform-specific padding for Android (48px) and iOS (60px)
- Proper icon usage with IconSymbol component
- Responsive layouts that work on all screen sizes
- All buttons and interactions have console.log statements for debugging

The app is ready to run! You can now test the UI flow and when you're ready to add backend functionality, you can enable Supabase and we'll connect the data layer. 🚀
